about_the_game:
IMPORTANT NOTE
The game's main focus is on exploration, as the tension slowly builds to create an even more immersive experience. The storyline is revealed through surreal visualization and implicit contextual details. Don't forget that this is a complex and unusual game in many ways.

Whispers in The Void is a first-person psychological thriller.

Explore a mysterious mental hospital in an atmospheric game world, where many anomalies are trying to harm you, causing genuine horror.


Storyline
The game begins with the protagonist, John Eikts, awakening in a mysterious and foreboding facility. Eikts quickly discovers that he is in a place designed to contain anomalies — supernatural entities with abilities beyond comprehension. The initial tranquility is shattered when a catastrophic event occurs, causing the anomalies to breach their containment cells and unleash chaos.

As Eikts explores the facility, he encounters the aftermath of the anomalies' rampage. The once-secure cells now lie shattered, and the lifeless bodies of facility personnel bear witness to the destructive power of the unleashed entities. The objective becomes clear: Eikts must navigate the labyrinthine halls, avoid the remaining anomalies, and escape the nightmarish facility.

Throughout his harrowing journey, Eikts unravels the facility's dark history and the experiments conducted to control and harness the anomalies. He discovers fragmented documents and audio logs that hint at his own involvement in the experiments, raising questions about his forgotten past.

As Eikts inches closer to freedom, the anomalies seem to be actively hunting him. He experiences inexplicable phenomena and begins to question his sanity. Distorted visions and whispers from unseen forces haunt him, further blurring the line between reality and nightmare.

In a climactic twist, Eikts stumbles upon a hidden chamber containing records that reveal the shocking truth: he is not an innocent victim, but an anomaly himself.



Anomalies
The anomalies that lived in the hospital will haunt you and leave you restless. They’ll follow your every move, watch you from every corner, play tricks with your mind, and try to attack you. Why do they haunt you? What have you done? This you have to find out on your own.



Gameplay
In Whispers in The Void, you are not defenseless; somtimes you can found weapons could save you from the dreadful entities. You’ll be able to pick up key elements, interact with the environment, and search for things that may help you escape this nightmare or pull you deeper into it.



You need to hide when the attacks start, you can also find things that will help in your progress through the game



The game contains realistic depictions of violent scenes that can have a negative impact on the psyche. A reasonable limit on the gaming audience is recommended.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: WINDOWS® 7, 8, 8.1, 10
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i3 or AMD Ryzen™ 3
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 650 TI, 750 TI or AMD Radeon™ R7 360
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 6 GB available space

Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: WINDOWS® 7, 8, 8.1, 10
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5 or AMD Ryzen™ 5
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 1060, GTX 1070, GTX 1650, GTX 1650 Super, GTX 1660, or AMD Radeon RX 5600 XT, RX 480
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 7 GB available space
